segments.text: I'm honestly quite annoyed watching this entire situation unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just stands there, oblivious, while the kitchen fills with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a single basin sink, completely overflowing, yet she's just polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the water soaking her foot?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her complete lack of awareness is truly infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those children are clearly up to no good, risking a fall for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just the water; it's the general neglect of what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to take charge here, but she's completely checked out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the water damage this will cause to the cabinets and flooring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a preventable disaster, made worse by her inaction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calmly she continues her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of inattention is frankly shocking to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be aware of her surroundings, especially with children present.
segments.speaker: PAR
